formElement.label: vCloudDirector Connection:
formElement.documentation: Name of the configuration which holds the connection information for vCloudDirector. This must reference a valid existing configuration.

formElement.label: vCloudDirector Organization:
formElement.documentation: Name of the organization that contains the virtual datacenter. This must reference an existing Organization in vCloud Director.

formElement.label: Virtual Data Center:
formElement.documentation: Name of the virtual datacenter that contains the vApp that will be cloned.

formElement.label: vApp Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the vApp that will be cloned.

formElement.label: Destination Virtual Data Center:
formElement.documentation: Name of the virtual datacenter where the vApp will be cloned.
